content: Compose a two-sentence description of the sculpture "The Ecstasy of Saint Teresa" by Gian Lorenzo Bernini, highlighting its unique use of light and shadow to depict a religious experience.

"The Ecstasy of Saint Teresa" by Gian Lorenzo Bernini masterfully captures the moment of divine rapture through its dynamic interplay of light and shadow, creating an ethereal glow that seems to emanate from within the marble itself. This Baroque masterpiece uses the contrast of deep shadows and illuminated surfaces to enhance the spiritual fervor and emotional intensity of Saint Teresa's mystical experience.
